name: RealESRGAN_x4Plus Anime 6B
author: xinntao
description:
[Real-ESRGAN](https://github.com/xinntao/Real-ESRGAN) aims at developing Practical Algorithms for General Image/Video Restoration.

Real-ESRGAN aims at developing Practical Algorithms for General Image/Video Restoration.
We extend the powerful ESRGAN to a practical restoration application (namely, Real-ESRGAN), which is trained with pure synthetic data.

This model is optimized for anime images with much smaller model size.
